posts.post_title: (2) n172 Old Judge - Sent to ebay ending tonight
posts.post_content:
Billy O'Brien Washingtons - Corner torn off but doesn't detract from player image.  Strong Image. SGC A - Now at auction
[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k607/bn2cardz/bn2cardz/N172BillyOBrien1889small_zps3f874f2f.jpg[/IMG]

Danny Richardson NY- SGC 20, Now at auction

[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k607/bn2cardz/bn2cardz/e9625d53-c215-4a46-8648-6df4831feefd_zpsf156e0b3.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k607/bn2cardz/bn2cardz/eb11108f-83b7-4517-b3b6-2ce8b6780dac_zpsbcf2c4fd.jpg[/IMG]
Wish i saw this before you sent them to ebay. I wouldve made an offer.
+1, I would have gave you an offer.  I tried to get them off e-bay, but missed them by 5 minutes.

UGH! Where were you two for the last month? HAHA.  Oh well, it is what it is. 

I hope the new owner appreciates them as much as you two would have.

What I can do is pass on your messages to the new owner and if they are looking to do a flip than they can contact you.  You can PM if that is what you want me to do, but I will not give their info to you out of privacy to the new owners.
Don't worry about it something else will come around.
